results.text: Assen, a ten Neoo ad ddehmen wa $ef wa. Aûuvu di lbuq, d$a a ten Nessemlil akw.
A d Nessken nezzeh Loahennama, assen, i ijehliyen,
wid iwumi sêurrment wallen nnsen, mgal asmekti W. Llan ur zmiren i usemêes.
Day $ilen, wid ijehlen, ad rren imdanen iW, d imawlan war Nek? Ih, Nhegga Loahennama, d axxam i ijehliyen.
Ini: "ad awen mle$ at igiten imexsuôen sennig wiyav?
Wid iwumi iweddeô laâtab nnsen di tmeddurt n ddunit, wanag nitni nwan gerzen igi"?
Widak d wid i inekôen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, akked temlilit yideS. Mêan igiten nnsen. Ur ten Nwezzen, ass n tnekra.
